target: Shall I choose a hotel for you, or do you have a preference? 4 hotels have free parking and internet in that area.
context: <user> I will be staying in Cambridge. I need a hotel with wifi. <system> What about a and b guest house? It's in the East. <user> I need something in the centre. <system> There are 7 hotels which area do you prefer? <user> The north part of town <system> I ran a search in the north, there's 12 choices. Lets make sure were on the same page, is this the area that you want? Also hotel or Guesthouse? <user> Sorry, I've been all over the place. To be clear, I need a hotel with free wifi and parking that is in the centre. <system>
